      Classes in ca.thurn.jgail.core that implement Evaluator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AgentEvaluator
      An Evaluator which relies on an underlying Agent to perform evaluation.
      class  WinLossEvaluator
      An Evaluator which solely evaluates a state based on whether or not the provided player has won the game at that state.

    • Uses of Evaluator in ca.thurn.jgail.ingenious

      Classes in ca.thurn.jgail.ingenious that implement Evaluator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IngeniousState.CumulativeScoreEvaluator
      Evaluator which evaluates Ingenious game states by comparing the player's cumulative scores.
      static class  IngeniousState.LowestScoreEvaluator
      Evaluator which evaluates Ingenious game states by comparing the player's lowest scoring color in the state, breaking ties by looking at the second lowest score, and so on.
